name: Salvation Universe
blurb: Salvation Universe is a break away from normal games. Players will be able to choose how they play and explore the galaxy.

rewards.reward: Thank you for your pledge! For this sign of support, we here at Salvation Universe give you our eternal gratitude. You will also get a founder title

Kickstarter Pack\r\nYou will receive a unique personalized code that will unlock a Kickstarter Pack in your game. Opening this Pack will do several things to the game showing you how much we appreciate your support. Founder Title

You get a digital copy of Salvation Universe for Windows PC, Mac \r\nvia our website. Digital copies come with a digital manual. This low price is only available to those who help fund. This also includes: Kickstarter Pack. Founder Title

Salvation Universe Digital Copy You get a digital copy of Salvation Universe for Windows PC, Mac via your preferred digital retailer such as Steam or GOG.com. Digital copies come with a digital manual.  This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Great House gear.\u2028

Salvation Universe Digital Copy You get a digital copy of Salvation Universe for Windows PC, Mac via our website. Digital copies come with a digital manual.  This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Great House gear pack and early access to ship at level 8, early access to alpha.\u2028

Salvation Universe Digital Copy You get a digital copy of Salvation Universe for Windows PC, Mac via our website. Digital copies come with a digital manual.  This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Great House gear pack and be able to pick a ship from our elite pack, early access to ship at level 8 and early access to alpha.\u2028

You will also get a copy of our ART books that will be packed with all of our concept art and back stories of the different races.\u2028

You will be able to design and name a high level NPC.      \t \r\nFor your contribution, we will work together with you to create an item in the game. With or without stats, useful or useless your item will be in the final game. (Along with our design team, who will try to keep it within the boundaries of the game.) You will also get the Elite Founder title.

Salvation Universe Digital Copy You get a digital copy of Salvation Universe for Windows PC, Mac via our website. Digital copies come with a digital manual.  This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Great House gear pack and be able to pick a ship from our elite pack, early access to ship at level 8 and early access to alpha. You will also get a special medium mech and your first companion at level 8.You will also get a copy of our signed ART books that will be packed with all of our concept art and back stories of the different races. You will be able to design and name a high level NPC and write a line in the game. For your contribution, we will work together with you to create an item in the game. With or without stats, useful or useless your item will be in the final game. (Along with our design team, who will try to keep it within the boundaries of the game.)
